QUERY_CONFIG.query: select COUNT(*) as NB, M_FIX_DATE from FXNG_DBF WHERE M_FIRST_FXNG = 0 AND M_TRN_NUMBER IN (SELECT M_NB FROM TRN_HDR_DBF WHERE M_TRN_STATUS = 'LIVE') group by M_FIX_DATE
select COUNT(distinct M_TRN_NUMBER) as NB, M_FIX_DATE from FXNG_DBF WHERE M_FIRST_FXNG = 0 AND M_TRN_NUMBER IN (SELECT M_NB FROM TRN_HDR_DBF WHERE M_TRN_STATUS = 'LIVE') group by M_FIX_DATE
SELECT count(*) as NB, STATUS_DATE FROM MUREXDB.STPDOC_ENTRY_TABLE where STPDOC_REF_TYPE = 'FIXING' AND XMLFLOW_STATUS = '~SYS_ERROR~' group by STATUS_DATE

select count(*) as NB, STATUS_DATE from MUREXDB.STPDOC_ENTRY_TABLE where XMLFLOW_STATUS = '20' and STPDOC_REF not in (select STPDOC_REF from MUREXDB.STPDOC_ENTRY_TABLE where XMLFLOW_STATUS in ('8522', '6576')) group by STATUS_DATE
